description: The Urban Photo Sling offers a modern, comfortable and versatile way to carry and access camera gear, plus a tablet. Wear it three ways: front, back or side. Its compact design fits the way you go about your day. Load it two ways: from the top or with the front panel fully opened. The first gives you easy access, the second-maximum customization.
title: Lowepro 250 Urban Photo Sling (Black)
